General.Name: Mospec Semiconductor Corp
General.Description: Mospec Semiconductor Corp. operates as an integrated power semiconductor company in Taiwan. It provides solar cells, epitaxial silicon wafers, polished prime wafers, and wafer reclamation products, as well as surface mount devices. The company also offers discrete components, such as Schottky barrier rectifiers, transient voltage suppressor and small signal Schottky diodes, and mini dip bridges, as well as fast recovery, ultra-fast, and high efficiency rectifier diodes; and power transistors, such as Darlington and switching transistors. In addition, it provides foundry services for silicon epitaxy, wafer fabrication, and semiconductor packaging. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 76, Zhongshan Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 74442
